Arazni.info: Female human lich wizard 20/marshal 8 (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 188, Pathfinder RPG Mythic Adventures 38)

Baba Yaga.info: Female venerable advanced human witch 20/archmage 10 (Pathfinder RPG Advanced Player's Guide 65, Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 294, Pathfinder RPG Mythic Adventures 14)

Jarl Gnargorak.info: Male frost giant ranger 12/marshal 8 (Pathfinder RPG Mythic Adventures 38)

Kortash Khain.info: Male ghoul cleric of Kabriri 5/sorcerer (wildblooded) 5/mystic theurge 10/hierophant 6 (Pathfinder RPG Mythic Adventures 32, Pathfinder RPG Ultimate Magic 70)

Raskineya, the Dark Comet.info: Female adult void dragon (see Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 4)

The Whispering Tyrant.info: Human mythic lich necromancer 20 (Pathfinder RPG Mythic Adventures 206)
